ExternalData.Subtitlesect: International Wheat Agreement, 1986: (a) Wheat Trade Convention, 1986*

EIF.Label: Entry into force
EIF.Labeltext: 1 July 1986, in accordance with article 28(1). The Agreement was extended until 30 June 1993 and 30 June 1995, respectively, and was terminated in accordance with its provisions on 30 June 1995.

TreatyText.Label: Text
TreatyText.Text: United Nations, Treaty Series , vol. 1429, p. 71 and depositary notification C.N.139.1986.TREATIES-4/4 of 18 September 1986 (procès-verbal of rectification of the original).

Termination.Label: TERMINATION
Termination.Labeltext: Terminated in accordance with its provisions on 30 June 1995.
